Caption: Mr. M.C. Chagla delivers the Convocation address.
Description: Mr. Chagla spoke about the need for a large body of teachers in the field of Engineering and Technology, and encouraged graduates to enter the field of teaching. He addressed several issues that needed to be dealt with on a national level such as the lack of using technology for production on a larger scale to counter the problem of scarcity and dependence on other countries. He said that the Convocation was "One of the most imposing convocations I have ever addressed." Left to him: Dr. A.L. Mudaliar, Dr. Rajah Sir Muthiah Chettiar, Mr. Akbar Alikhan, Dr. Y. Nayudamma and Mr. A.A. Rahim are on the dais.
